title: VNotes
description: VNotes is a simple note application, with simple UI (user interface), the UI is very flexible and easy to navigate through screens. VNotes lets you create a note, read any note, edit any note and also delete any note you want to.
role: Developed the application from scratch as the sole developer responsible for all aspects of the project.
challenges_and_learnings: Maintaining a clean codebase and ensuring the application's performance. Move from using Provider for state management to using Bloc for state management, focused on separation of concerns and clean architecture.

title: CoinPlug
description: CoinPlug is a secure and reliable platform for crypto to naira converter. It offers the fastest and most reliable transactions you can think of, assuring our users of high-level protection. The platform is user-friendly for all, so you can rest assured of easy navigation through the platform without experiencing any difficulty.
role: Was brought in as a Flutter developer to finish the project as the previous developer left the project.
challenges_and_learnings: Working with Flutter Riverpod as I am not used to it, I work mainly with Bloc (Cubit).

title: BingPay
description: Bingpay is a Nigerian financial technology company that enables Africans to make payments for goods and services all over the world. It is a utility base application which helps customers to pay for utility services, such as Airtime, Data, TV, and Power, etc.
role: Worked on the project from the start of it as a Flutter developer. I was also brought in as a Flutter developer to finish the project.
